content.question: Wayland and Hytop are countries that trade with each other and have flexible exchange rates. Which of the following groups will benefit if Wayland’s currency depreciates relative to Hytop’s currency in the short run?

choices.label: Exporters in Hytop and importers in Hytop
Exporters in Hytop and importers in Wayland
Exporters in Hytop and exporters in Wayland
Importers in Hytop and importers in Wayland
Importers in Hytop and exporters in Wayland

content.answer: Importers in Hytop and exporters in Wayland

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
